entries.name: fullstack-iac:ansible
entries.intent: Generate Ansible playbooks and roles for server provisioning and configuration management

entries.name: fullstack-iac:api
entries.intent: Scaffold FastAPI backend with production features - auth, database, API docs, Docker

entries.name: fullstack-iac:docker
entries.intent: Generate optimized Docker configurations with multi-stage builds and docker-compose

entries.name: fullstack-iac:frontend
entries.intent: Scaffold React/Vite frontend with TypeScript, routing, state management, and deployment

entries.name: fullstack-iac:infra
entries.intent: Generate Terraform infrastructure as code for AWS, Azure, or GCP

entries.name: fullstack-iac:k8s
entries.intent: Generate Kubernetes manifests or Helm charts with best practices and production readiness

entries.name: fullstack-iac:monorepo
entries.intent: Create full-stack monorepo with multiple services - API, web, admin, mobile

entries.name: fullstack-iac:new
entries.intent: Create complete full-stack project with all configurations - infrastructure, frontend, backend, CI/CD
